text: Hagi Deviti'a ananteti onasi'a vugamanu ategeno, Mefiboseti eri'za ne' Siba'a Devitina tutagiha hunte'naku eme avega antenegeno ome ke'ne. Hagi agra tare donkifi 200'a breti konagi, fiki raga 100'a konagi, ante hagage hu'nea waini raga'a 100'a konagi huno erineno meme afumofo akru'are tro hu'naza tintafempi waini tina erino emani'ne.
